contents.secondTitle: Cornerstone International Community College of Canada (CICCC)
contents.text: Learning web design skills with React.js.  Learning OOP with Java, Android, and Swift languages for mobile app development.
Master of Computer and Information Sciences. Specialized in Recommender system and information visualization. Cumulative GPA 3.3/4.0

contents.term: International Exchange Association / Tokyo, Japan/ Jun 2011 – Dec 2014
contents.text: Showed international students the sights. Gave international students advice mainly related to the University. Taught international students Japanese culture and language.

Broadcasted news by coordinating video and audio at the production control room. Coordinated equipments such as cameras, audio mixers, and servers. Directed operation and maintenance for network systems.
Created desktop app with Java collaborating other developer. In addition to the app, created landing page to promote it by using html, sass.

contents.term: Tokyo Metropolitan University / Tokyo, Japan / Apr 2014 – Mar 2016
contents.text: Proposed new method based on users' rating for a recommender system, and built the system based on it using Ruby on Rails. Conducted user experiment by using the system and collecting questionnaires. Publish a paper to the International Association.

contents.term: Tokyo Metropolitan University / Tokyo, Japan / April 2013 – March 2014
contents.text: Proposed new algorithm for image noise reduction with less processing time. Proofed the effectiveness of the method through the simulation.  Published a paper to the International Association.
